name: Number Masquerade
description:
INTRODUCTION:

This game is designed to engage the player in an interactive competition against the computer. The goal of the game is for the player to think of a number while the computer tries to guess it based on a limited number of tires. It is a very simplistic concept designed with the purpose of having  fun in this casual game for the player to enjoy. In their free time of course :)

DOWNLOAD TO PLAY IN FULL SCREEN!

INSTRUCTIONS:

• Think of a number

• Computer tries to guess it

• If the computer guesses correctly You Lose

• If the computer fails to guess your number, You Win!

CREDITS:

ART: All game assets and character designs were provided by the talented Amango!

https://www.instagram.com/__amango/

Programming and animation : demon202

Music provided by https://freesound.org/
